name: Crowd of Cinders
text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Crowd of Cinders's power and toughness are each equal to the number of black permanents you control.

editions.flavor: They envy the life-giving heat so much that they tear it from those who still possess it.
They envy the life-giving heat so much that they tear it from those who still possess it.

name: Crowd's Favor
text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

name: Crowned Ceratok
text:
Trample
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

editions.flavor: The best way to calm a rampaging ceratok is to wait until it dies of natural causes.
The best way to calm a rampaging ceratok is to wait until it dies of natural causes.

name: Crown-Hunter Hireling
text:
When Crown-Hunter Hireling enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Crown-Hunter Hireling can't attack unless defending player is the monarch.

editions.flavor: While most in Paliano seek fame through favor, he'll settle for infamy through blood.

name: Crown of Ascension
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
Sacrifice Crown of Ascension: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it gain flying until end of turn.

editions.flavor: "Wisdom, clear my eyes."

name: Crown of Awe
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from black and from red.
Sacrifice Crown of Awe: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it gain protection from black and from red until end of turn.

editions.flavor: "Honor, guide my step."

name: Crown of Convergence
text:
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
As long as the top card of your library is a creature card, creatures you control that share a color with that card get +1/+1.
{G}{W}: Put the top card of your library on the bottom of your library.

name: Crown of Doom
text:
Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{2}: Target player other than Crown of Doom's owner gains control of it. Activate this ability only during your turn.

editions.flavor: Every head it rests upon winds up severed.

name: Crown of Empires
text: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature. Gain control of that creature instead if you control artifacts named Scepter of Empires and Throne of Empires.

editions.flavor:
"With this crown, assert your authority."
—Crown inscription

name: Crown of Flames
text:
Enchant creature
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{R}: Return Crown of Flames to its owner's hand.

editions.flavor:
"All my life I've fought these monsters. Today I finish that fight."
—Barrin
It is the forge of kings.

name: Crown of Fury
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has first strike.
Sacrifice Crown of Fury: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

editions.flavor: "Passion, fire my heart."

name: Crown of Suspicion
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-1.
Sacrifice Crown of Suspicion: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it get +2/-1 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: "Darkness, hide my fear."

name: Crown of the Ages
text: {4}, {T}: Attach target Aura attached to a creature to another creature.

name: Crown of Vigor
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Sacrifice Crown of Vigor: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it get +1/+1 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: "Life, be my shield."

name: Crow of Dark Tidings
text:
Flying
When Crow of Dark Tidings enters the battlefield or dies, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

name: Crucible of Fire
text: Dragon creatures you control get +3/+3.

editions.flavor:
"The dragon is a perfect marriage of power and the will to use it."
—Sarkhan Vol

"The dragon is a perfect marriage of power and the will to use it."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Crucible of the Spirit Dragon
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Put a storage counter on Crucible of the Spirit Dragon.
{T}, Remove X storage counters from Crucible of the Spirit Dragon: Add X mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast Dragon spells or activate abilities of Dragons.

name: Crucible of Worlds
text: You may play land cards from your graveyard.

editions.flavor: By isolating liquid aether at room temperature, foundry hand Jitya Reyath has given us a glimpse of raw aetheric matter—the very stuff of the cosmos.
Amidst the darkest ashes grow the strongest seeds.
Amidst the darkest ashes grow the strongest seeds.
Amidst the darkest ashes grow the strongest seeds.

name: Crude Rampart
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Morph {4}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

editions.flavor: Success is one part inspiration, nine parts desperation.

name: Cruel Bargain
text: Draw four cards. You lose half your life, rounded up.

name: Cruel Deceiver
text:
{1}: Look at the top card of your library.
{2}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, Cruel Deceiver gains "Whenever Cruel Deceiver deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature" until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

name: Cruel Edict
text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.

editions.flavor:
"No mockeries now for them; no prayers nor bells, / Nor any voice of mourning save the choirs,— / The shrill, demented choirs of wailing shells."
—Wilfred Owen,
"Anthem for Doomed Youth"

"Choose your next words carefully. They will be your last."
—Phage the Untouchable

"Such a fragile organ, the brain."
—Tojira, swamp queen

editions.flavor:
"Choose your next words carefully. They will be your last."
—Phage the Untouchable

"Choose your next words carefully. They will be your last."
—Phage the Untouchable

name: Cruel Entertainment
text: Choose target player and another target player. The first player controls the second player during the second player's next turn, and the second player controls the first player during the first player's next turn.

name: Cruel Fate
text: Look at the top five cards of target opponent's library. Put one of those cards into that player's graveyard and the rest on top of his or her library in any order.

name: Cruel Feeding
text:
Strive — Cruel Feeding costs {2}{B} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Any number of target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

name: Cruel Finality
text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

editions.flavor: Bitter the bite of a demon's steel, and deep the abyss it opens.

name: Cruel Reality
text:
Enchant player
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. If the player can't, he or she loses 5 life.

editions.flavor: As Gideon watched the initiate murder his crop-mate, his admiration of the city of Naktamun gave way to horror.

name: Cruel Revival
text: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Return up to one target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.

editions.flavor: On Innistrad, Liliana embraced necromancy, honing her powers by practicing on scores of undead—and sometimes the living.
Few Cabal fighters fear death. They fear what follows it.
Few Cabal fighters fear death. They fear what follows it.

name: Cruel Sadist
text:
{B}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Cruel Sadist.
{2}{B}, {T}, Remove X +1/+1 counters from Cruel Sadist: Cruel Sadist deals X damage to target creature.

editions.flavor:
Face of innocence. Hand of death.
Designed by Edmund McMillen

name: Cruel Tutor
text: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.

editions.flavor: The more you pay for the lesson, the better you'll remember it.

name: Cruel Ultimatum
text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature, discards three cards, then loses 5 life. You return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand, draw three cards, then gain 5 life.

editions.set: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas
editions.flavor: There is always a greater power.

name: Crumble
text: Destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated. That artifact's controller gains life equal to its converted mana cost.

editions.flavor: The spirits of Argoth grant new life to those who repent the folly of enslaving their labors to devices.

"Ashes and dust; dust and ashes.
Hope it works before it smashes."
—Argivian children's rhyme
The spirits of Argoth grant new life to those who repent the folly of enslaving their labors to devices.

text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Exile target nonbasic land. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that land and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

name: Crumbling Ashes
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy target creature with a -1/-1 counter on it.

editions.flavor:
"I was there to watch my brothers' quenching. I drew the slightest warmth from their dying rage."
—Illulia of Nighthearth

name: Crumbling Colossus
text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
When Crumbling Colossus attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.

text:

text: If damage would be dealt to a player, that player exiles that many cards from the top of his or her library instead.

name: Crumbling Vestige
text:
Crumbling Vestige enters the battlefield tapped.
When Crumbling Vestige enters the battlefield, add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. ({C} represents colorless mana.)

name: Crusade
text: White creatures get +1/+1.

editions.flavor:
"Finally, I understand. Home isn't where you rest. It's what you fight for."
—Elspeth Tirel

name: Crusader of Odric
text: Crusader of Odric's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

editions.flavor: "We are Odric's sword. We strike without fear, for his mind has divined how our foe will be slain."

name: Crusading Knight
text:
Protection from black
Crusading Knight gets +1/+1 for each Swamp your opponents control.

editions.flavor: "My only dream is to destroy the nightmares of others."

name: Crush
text: Destroy target noncreature artifact.

editions.flavor: A golem's hands know no tenderness.

name: Crusher Zendikon
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a 4/2 red Beast creature with trample. It's still a land.
When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

name: Crushing Pain
text: Crushing Pain deals 6 damage to target creature that was dealt damage this turn.

editions.flavor: It is said that the mere touch of a kami is like embracing the sun itself.

name: Crushing Vines
text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with flying.
• Destroy target artifact.

editions.flavor:
"Your veil's curse won't stop me, deathmage. I have taken down countless night hunters and this dark plane is not big enough for you to hide."
—Garruk Wildspeaker, to Liliana Vess

name: Crush of Tentacles
text:
Surge {3}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its surge cost if you or a teammate has cast another spell this turn.)
Return all nonland permanents to their owners' hands. If Crush of Tentacles's surge cost was paid, create an 8/8 blue Octopus creature token.

name: Crush of Wurms
text:
Create three 6/6 green Wurm creature tokens.
Flashback {9}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

"a giant's footprint"

—Kithkin phrase meaning

name: Crux of Fate
text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all Dragon creatures.
• Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.

editions.flavor: Ugin's whispered summons led Sarkhan Vol to the moment that would echo down the centuries and seal Tarkir's fate: the primal battle between Ugin and Nicol Bolas.

name: Cryoclasm
text: Destroy target Plains or Island. Cryoclasm deals 3 damage to that land's controller.

editions.flavor: The people of Terisiare had come to live on frozen fields as though on solid ground. Nothing reminded them of the difference more clearly than the rifts brought on by the Thaw.
The people of Terisiare had come to live on frozen fields as though on solid ground. Nothing reminded them of the difference more clearly than the rifts brought on by the Thaw.

name: Cry of Contrition
text:
Target player discards a card.
Haunt (When this spell card is put into a graveyard after resolving, exile it haunting target creature.)
When the creature Cry of Contrition haunts dies, target player discards a card.

name: Crypsis
text: Target creature you control gains protection from creatures your opponents control until end of turn. Untap it.

editions.flavor: Tritons borrow the camouflage of their oceanic prey to become predators on land.

name: Crypt Angel
text:
Flying, protection from white
When Crypt Angel enters the battlefield, return target blue or red creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

editions.flavor: Once an angel, now an abomination.

name: Cryptborn Horror
text:
Trample
Cryptborn Horror enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the total life lost by your opponents this turn.

editions.flavor: Although Cryptwitch Merree vanished after a spat with Rakdos, her playthings lingered.

name: Cryptbreaker
text:
{1}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
Tap three untapped Zombies you control: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

name: Crypt Champion
text:
Double strike
When Crypt Champion enters the battlefield, each player puts a creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from his or her graveyard onto the battlefield.
When Crypt Champion enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {R} was spent to cast it.

name: Crypt Cobra
text: Whenever Crypt Cobra attacks and isn't blocked, defending player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

name: Crypt Creeper
text: Sacrifice Crypt Creeper: Exile target card from a graveyard.

editions.flavor:
"I guess what they say is true. What doesn't kill you makes you stronger. Or at least stranger."
—Captain Eberhart
To unearth its dinner, it inters itself.

name: Crypt Ghast
text:
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add {B} to your mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

name: Cryptic Annelid
text: When Cryptic Annelid enters the battlefield, scry 1, then scry 2, then scry 3. (To scry X, look at the top X cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Cryptic Command
text:
Choose two —
• Counter target spell.
• Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
• Tap all creatures your opponents control.
• Draw a card.

name: Cryptic Cruiser
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{2}{U}, Put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard: Tap target creature.

editions.flavor: "The seas are no less imperiled than the dry lands. This fight is mine as much as it is yours."—Kiora, to Gideon Jura

name: Cryptic Gateway
text: Tap two untapped creatures you control: You may put a creature card from your hand that shares a creature type with each creature tapped this way onto the battlefield.

editions.flavor: Its lock changes to fit each key.

name: Cryptic Serpent
text: Cryptic Serpent costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.

editions.flavor: It slithers through the senses, constricting consciousness and poisoning perceptions.

name: Crypt Incursion
text: Exile all creature cards from target player's graveyard. You gain 3 life for each card exiled this way.

editions.flavor: The Golgari maze-runner Varolz hungers to prove his fortitude in battle, and his trail of victims feeds other hungers.

name: Crypt of Agadeem
text:
Crypt of Agadeem enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool for each black creature card in your graveyard.

name: Cryptolith Fragment
text:
Cryptolith Fragment enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Each player loses 1 life.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if each player has 10 or less life, transform Cryptolith Fragment.

name: Cryptolith Rite
text: Creatures you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

editions.flavor: The chant was incomprehensible, but its power was unmistakable.

name: Cryptoplasm
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have Cryptoplasm become a copy of another target creature. If you do, Cryptoplasm gains this ability.

editions.flavor:
"If left in the enemy's shape too long, it might be lost to them."
—Vy Covalt, Neurok agent

name: Crypt Rats
text: {X}: Crypt Rats deals X damage to each creature and each player. Spend only black mana on X.

editions.flavor:
Beware anything born among the dead.
—Tolarian saying

"Once I dreamt of death, but now it dreams of me / And only rats and rotting flesh can hear my silent plea."
—Mundungu chant

name: Crypt Ripper
text:
Haste
{B}: Crypt Ripper gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: The tender light of the living quickens the pulse of the dead.

name: Crypt Sliver
text: All Slivers have "{T}: Regenerate target Sliver."

editions.flavor:
"Death couldn't contain the slivers. What made us think we could?"
—Riptide Project researcher

name: Cryptwailing
text: {1}, Exile two creature cards from your graveyard: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

editions.flavor:
"Piece the tragic notes together and is it not a melody?"
—Teysa

name: Crystal Ball
text: {1}, {T}: Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

editions.flavor: It glints with arcane truths to those who know how to glimpse them.

name: Crystal Chimes
text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Crystal Chimes: Return all enchantment cards from your graveyard to your hand.

editions.flavor: As Serra was to learn, the peace and sanctity of her realm were as fragile as glass.
As Serra was to learn, the peace and sanctity of her realm were as fragile as glass.

name: Crystal Golem
text: At the beginning of your end step, Crystal Golem phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before you untap during your next untap step.)

editions.flavor:
"Once, a wealthy king commissioned an artificial creature to be crafted from the royal treasury, thinking it a clever ploy to have the jewels guard themselves."
—Azeworai, "The Golem's Wish"

name: Crystalline Crawler
text:
Converge — Crystalline Crawler enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.
